RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Graduated cum laude in Classics (1996) at Catania University with a focus on Ancient Languages (Latin and Greek), with a dissertation in Greek Literature, entitled "Scoli antichi all'Ippolito di Euripide"
Post-Graduate Diploma in Greek Paleography (1998) from the Vatican School of Paleography, Diplomatics and Archive Administration
PhD in Philosophy and History of Ideas at Catania University with a dissertation about the relationship between rhetoric and philosophy, entitled "Un commentario inedito al Per Heureseos dello Ps. Ermogene"
Accepted to DML (Doctorate of Modern Languages) Program at Middlebury College (Vermont - USA) - third year completed
Bolsa de ps-doutorado CAPES-PNPD ? Programa Nacional de Ps-Doutoramento, realizado no mbito do Programa de Ps-Graduao em Filosofia da Universidade Federal de So Paulo (Unifesp) (2018-2019)
Lecturer on contract at Catania University for basic courses of Latin since 2015
Latin and Greek teacher since 2001 at Liceo Classico "M. Rapisardi" - Patern (Catania - Italy)
Vice Headmaster at Liceo Classico "Mario Rapisardi" Patern (CT) - from 2008 to 2018
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Possui doutorado em Filosofia - Universit degli Studi di Catania (2002). Tem experincia na rea de Letras, com nfase em Lnguas Clssicas Accepted to DML (Doctor of Modern Languages) Program at Middlebury College - USA (first year completed)- Latin and Greek teacher since 2001 at Liceo Classico "M. Rapisardi" - Patern (Catania - Italy) Vice Headmaster at Liceo Classico "Mario Rapisardi" Patern (CT) - since 2008 Has experience in Language, focusing on Classical Languages, acting on the following subjects: platonismo, retorica classica, edizione, teodicea and esegesi.
